pages.title: The Floor is Lava
pages.text: With $(item)Chili Powder$() at your disposal, you can start producing other, similarly hot materials. Combining the powder with $(item)Liquid Mana$() in a $(thing)Boiling$() $(item)Cauldron$() transforms it into the dangerously hot $(item)Lava$().

pages.heading: Lava
pages.description: Converting Liquid Mana into Lava.$(br)Requires Fire under the Cauldron
